name: Xross Fighters: Ultimate Versus (Test demo Ver)
name_original: Xross Fighters: Ultimate Versus (Test demo Ver)
description:
Welcome the ultimate crossover fight of the century! Fight with your favorite Fighters from different universes and win the galactic championship! #arcade #fighting #Crossover

How to play (Demo Ver.):

Light attack1 ---X

Hard attack1---Y

Light attack2---A

Hard attack2---B

Call assist------C

Xross Cancel---Z

Xross Break---- Down+C+Z

Super Move---- D,DF,F,D,DF,F,Y+X
